component.name: listCustomMetrics
component.description: Retrieve a list of customMetrics from GoogleAnalytics account.

component.name: getCustomMetric
component.description: Retrieve details of a customMetrics identified by the provided customMetrics ID.

component.name: createCustomMetric
component.description: Create a new customMetrics in GoogleAnalytics account using the provided Parameters.

component.name: updateCustomMetric
component.description: Update details of the customMetrics identified by the provided customMetrics ID.

component.name: patchCustomMetric
component.description: Updates an existing custom metric. This method supports patch semantics.
